Each worker has its own GitHub branch and Vercel deployment. Workers report progress independently via HTTP callbacks. The frontend aggregates all events via SSE into a unified real-time dashboard. No worker depends on another &mdash; they race to complete the same task with different approaches.<br><br><b>Key Insight:</b> Task &rarr; N &times; (Idea + Worker Profile) &rarr; N &times; (Repo Branch + Vercel Deploy + PITCH.md) &rarr; Evaluate &rarr; Rank" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontSize=11;fontColor=#333;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="45" y="615" width="1270" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> <diagram name="3.
